title: The Special Blessings Prayer: How To Unleash God's Love, Favor & Power Upon Your Life
description: ♥ What if you could set yourself free from the trauma and pain of the past…with one simple prayer? ♥Sounds impossible, right?In this powerful book from the #1 bestselling author of Becoming the Woman God Wants Me To Be, you’ll discover a proven process that will heal your heart and make your spirit soar with hope.This Bible study devotional for women is for you ✓ Someone betrayed you…and you need the courage to trust again.✓ You’re holding on to past hurts.✓ You don’t understand why God let certain things happen to you.You’ll be amazed to discover exactly how Abigail turned a death threat into a marriage proposal (1 Samuel 25). In just one chapter, her life story changed from abused wife…to future queen.God can change your life in an instant, too.If you’ve ever been treated unfairly, believe it or not, that’s actually good news. It means you are positioned for promotion. Because nothing releases the favor of God like a godly response to an unfair situation. Get ready to find out why!Written in Donna Partow’s signature style — authentic, humorous, and filled with the unconditional love of God. Prepare to believe God has wonderful things in store for you.If you enjoyed Donna’s book on the Proverbs 31 woman, you’ll love this inspiring look at the equally-wonderful (but imperfect) wife of King David.Also, find out about the FREE online class that takes a deeper dive into the story, and walks you step-by-step through the healing process.This forgiveness study guide is a cross between a Bible study and daily devotional. It’s ideal for small group bible study, but can also serve as a personal forgiveness journal. If you are ready – and believe it’s time to set yourself free through the power of God’s Word – look no further. This book was written just for you.More than 400 5-star reviews◆ Scroll Up to Get Your Copy Today ◆
author: Donna Partow
